column4: I have installed succesfully ubuntu as a partition with windows, then the wireless didn't work so I did all this stuff (specifieded on the webpage https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EeePC/Fixes) and then it works. but then I restarted the laptop and get the same problem i did it all over again and now its working.
I need to know how to get this fix, because I don't want to make this all again when I turn on the laptop
